name: Crate Slam
description:
Play as a guy with an armored booster diving suit to get his pet fishes back home!

In the world of Crate Slam, oceans are full of crates and dangerous creatures that will get you.

Art by Stephanie Tandya

Instructions:

Click to fullscreen and ESC to exit fullscreen

(Keyboard)

Hold A or D to move,

Press W to jump and double press W to slam.

(Gamepad)

D-pad to move,

Press B to jump and double press B to slam.

Also available on Google Play.

A game by Jeremy Limanto & Hardian

Theme song by Jevon Sutjitra
